commit message: Fixed lack of space in random reminders

Fix tag picker issues

* Fix NPE when there are duplicate tags
* New tags survive rotation
Exclude from join by tag uuid instead of name
Include all active and visible tasks in My Tasks
Fix tag control set line breaks on older devices

Add analytic events

* Track tag colors
* Track font size, title length, built-in filters

Update translations, bump version
